name: ocean_conditions_closest_to_latitude_longitude
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool wavebase.
Tool description: Wave, Weather and Tide Conditions for any spot on the Ocean Surface.

XYZ Tiles for Global Wave Conditions

https://wavebase.app
API description: â€‹https://api.wavebase.app/v4/conditions/search/{latitude}/{longitude}

Search for current and predicted ocean conditions closest to a given latitude/longitude.

Returned conditions include the closest point found, along with Waves, Tides and Weather conditions are the location.

latitude.description: The latitude coordinate of the location.

longitude.description: The longitude coordinate of the location.
